ConfigItem.Name: Broadcast Enabled
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether automatic transmission of states of the serial port is enabled

ConfigItem.Name: Broadcast Rate
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: Baud Rate
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the baudrate of the sensor serial connection

ConfigItem.Name: Raw Gyro Output Enabled
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether raw gyro data is transmitted in serial state broadcasts

ConfigItem.Name: Raw Accel Output Enabled
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether raw accel data is transmitted in serial state broadcasts

ConfigItem.Name: Raw Mag Output Enabled
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether raw magnetometer data is transmitted in serial state broadcasts

ConfigItem.Name: Processed Gyro Output Enabled
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether processed gyro data is transmitted in serial state broadcasts

ConfigItem.Name: Processed Accel Output Enabled
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether processed accel data is transmitted in serial state broadcasts

ConfigItem.Name: Processed Mag Output Enabled
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether processed magnetometer data is transmitted in serial state broadcasts

ConfigItem.Name: Quaternion Output Enabled
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether quaternion data is transmitted in serial state broadcasts

ConfigItem.Name: Euler Output Enabled
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether euler angles are transmitted in serial state broadcasts

ConfigItem.Name: Covariance Output Enabled
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether the 4x4 error covariance matrix is transmitted in serial state broadcasts

ConfigItem.Name: Theta acc. output enabled
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether automatic transmission of the accel-based angle estimate is enabled

ConfigItem.Name: Theta acc. hat output enabled
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether automatic transmission of the expected accel-based angle estimate is enabled

ConfigItem.Name: Theta LPF Enabled
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether the accel-LPF based states are transmitted

ConfigItem.Name: Theta Direct Enabled
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether the direct accel-based states are transmitted

ConfigItem.Name: Mag Update Enabled
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether magnetometer measurements are used to update state estimates

ConfigItem.Name: Accel Update Enabled
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether accelerometer measurements are used to update state estimates

ConfigItem.Name: Gyro Startup Calibration
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether rate gyro biases should be automatically measured on startup

ConfigItem.Name: Quaternion Estimation Enabled
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether quaternions should be used instead of Euler Angles for attitude estimation

ConfigGroup.Name: Sensor Reference Vectors
ConfigGroup.Description: Expected magnetometer outputs when yaw, pitch, and roll angles are zero

ConfigItem.Name: Mag X Ref
ConfigItem.Description: x-axis component of the magnetic field reference vector

ConfigItem.Name: Mag Y Ref
ConfigItem.Description: y-axis component of the magnetic field reference vector

ConfigItem.Name: Mag Z Ref
ConfigItem.Description: z-axis component of the magnetic field reference vector

ConfigItem.Name: Accel X Ref
ConfigItem.Description: x-axis component of the accelerometer reference vector

ConfigItem.Name: Accel Y Ref
ConfigItem.Description: y-axis component of the accelerometer reference vector

ConfigItem.Name: Accel Z Ref
ConfigItem.Description: z-axis component of the accelerometer reference vector

ConfigGroup.Name: EKF Variances
ConfigGroup.Description: Variances used in the EKF for state estimation

ConfigItem.Name: Mag Variance
ConfigItem.Description: Variance of magnetometer measurements

ConfigItem.Name: Accel Variance
ConfigItem.Description: Variance of accelerometer measurements

ConfigItem.Name: Process Variance
ConfigItem.Description: Variance of process noise

ConfigGroup.Name: Sensor Biases
ConfigGroup.Description: Rate gyro and accelerometer output biases

ConfigItem.Name: Gyro X Bias
ConfigItem.Description: Bias of x-axis rate gyro

ConfigItem.Description: Bias of y-axis rate gyro

ConfigItem.Description: Bias of x-axis accelerometer

ConfigItem.Name: Accel Y Bias
ConfigItem.Description: Bias of y-axis accelerometer

ConfigItem.Name: Accel Z Bias
ConfigItem.Description: Bias of z-axis accelerometer

ConfigItem.Name: Mag X Bias
ConfigItem.Description: Bias of x-axis magnetometer

ConfigItem.Name: Mag Y Bias
ConfigItem.Description: Bias of y-axis magnetometer

ConfigItem.Name: Mag Z Bias
ConfigItem.Description: Bias of z-axis magnetometer

DataItem.Name: Mag Init
DataItem.Description: Asserted if magnetometer initialization failed on startup

DataItem.Name: Accel Init
DataItem.Description: Asserted if accelerometer initialization failed on startup

DataItem.Name: Gyro Init
DataItem.Description: Asserted if rate gyro initialization failed on startup

DataItem.Name: Gyro X Self-Test
DataItem.Description: Asserted if the x-axis rate gyro self-test failed

DataItem.Name: Gyro Y Self-Test
DataItem.Description: Asserted if the y-axis rate gyro self-test failed

DataItem.Name: Gyro Z Self-Test
DataItem.Description: Asserted if the z-axis rate gyro self-test failed

DataItem.Name: Accel X Self-Test
DataItem.Description: Asserted if the x-axis accelerometer self-test failed

DataItem.Name: Accel Y Self-Test
DataItem.Description: Asserted if the y-axis accelerometer self-test failed

DataItem.Name: Accel Z Self-Test
DataItem.Description: Asserted if the z-axis accelerometer self-test failed

DataItem.Name: Mag X Self-Test
DataItem.Description: Asserted if the x-axis magnetometer self-test failed

DataItem.Name: Mag Y Self-Test
DataItem.Description: Asserted if the y-axis magnetometer self-test failed

DataItem.Name: Mag Z Self-Test
DataItem.Description: Asserted if the z-axis magnetometer self-test failed

DataItem.Name: Gyro i2c Bus Error
DataItem.Description: Asserted if there was an i2c bus error while communicating with the rate gyros

DataItem.Name: Accel i2c Bus Error
DataItem.Description: Asserted if there was an i2c bus error while communicating with the accelerometers

DataItem.Name: Mag i2c Bus Error
DataItem.Description: Asserted if there was an i2c bus error while communicating with the magnetometer

DataItem.Name: EKF Divergent
DataItem.Description: Asserted if the EKF estimate diverged and had to be reset

DataItem.Name: Gyros Unresponsive
DataItem.Description: Asserted if the gyros fail to signal new data available for longer than expected

DataItem.Name: Accels Unresponsive
DataItem.Description: Asserted if the accels fail to signal new data available for longer than expected

DataItem.Name: Mag Unresponsive
DataItem.Description: Asserted if the magnetometer fails to signal new data available for longer than expected

DataItem.Name: Self-Test Complete
DataItem.Description: Asserted if a self-test operation was completed

DataItem.Name: Raw X Gyro
DataItem.Description: Raw (unprocessed) data from x-axis rate gyro

DataItem.Name: Raw Y Gyro
DataItem.Description: Raw (unprocessed) data from y-axis rate gyro

DataItem.Name: Raw Z Gyro
DataItem.Description: Raw (unprocessed) data from z-axis rate gyro

DataItem.Description: Processed data from x-axis rate gyro (biases subtracted, scale factors and alignment compensation applied)

DataItem.Name: Processed Y Gyro
DataItem.Description: Processed data from y-axis rate gyro (biases subtracted, scale factors and alignment compensation applied)

DataItem.Name: Processed Z Gyro
DataItem.Description: Processed data from z-axis rate gyro (biases subtracted, scale factors and alignment compensation applied)

DataItem.Description: Raw (unprocessed) data from x-axis accelerometer

DataItem.Description: Processed data from x-axis accelerometer (biases subtracted, scale factors and alignment compensation applied)

DataItem.Name: Processed Z Accel
DataItem.Description: Processed data from z-axis accelerometer (biases subtracted, scale factors and alignment compensation applied)

DataItem.Name: Raw X Mag

DataItem.Description: Processed data from x-axis magnetometer (biases subtracted, soft and hard iron compensation applied)

Register.Name: UM6_COMMUNICATION
Register.Description: Communication settings

Register.Name: UM6_MISC_CONFIG
Register.Description: Miscellaneous configuration settings, including EKF configuration items

Register.Name: UM6_MAG_REF_X
Register.Description: Magnetic field reference vector x-axis component. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating-point value.

Register.Name: UM6_MAG_REF_Y
Register.Description: Magnetic field reference vector y-axis component. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating-point value.

Register.Name: UM6_MAG_REF_Z
Register.Description: Magnetic field reference vector x-axis component. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating-point value.

Register.Name: UM6_ACCEL_REF_X
Register.Description: Accelerometer reference vector x-axis component. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating-point value.

Register.Name: UM6_ACCEL_REF_Y
Register.Description: Accelerometer reference vector y-axis component. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating-point value.

Register.Name: UM6_ACCEL_REF_Z
Register.Description: Accelerometer reference vector z-axis component. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating-point value.

Register.Name: UM6_EKF_MAG_VARIANCE
Register.Description: Variance used in the EKF for magnetometer sensor updates. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating-point value.

Register.Name: UM6_EKF_ACCEL_VARIANCE
Register.Description: Variance used in the EKF for accelerometer sensor updates. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating-point value.

Register.Name: UM6_EKF_PROCESS_VARIANCE
Register.Description: Variance used in the EKF for state prediction. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating-point value.

Register.Name: UM6_GYRO_BIAS_XY
Register.Description: Gyro biases on the X and Y axes (applied to raw data). Stored as 16-bit signed integers.

Register.Name: UM6_GYRO_BIAS_Z
Register.Description: Gyro bias on the Z axis (applied to raw data). Stored as 16-bit signed integer.

Register.Name: UM6_ACCEL_BIAS_XY
Register.Description: Accelerometer biases on the X and Y axes (applied to raw data). Stored as 16-bit signed integers.

Register.Name: UM6_ACCEL_BIAS_Z
Register.Description: Accelerometer bias on the Z axis (applied to raw data). Stored as 16-bit signed integer.

Register.Name: UM6_MAG_BIAS_XY
Register.Description: Magnetometer biases on the X and Y axes (applied to raw data). Stored as 16-bit signed integers.

Register.Name: UM6_MAG_BIAS_Z
Register.Description: Magnetometer biases on the Z aiss (applied to raw data). Stored as 16-bit signed integer.

Register.Name: UM6_ACCEL_CAL_00
Register.Description: Row 0 column 0 element of accelerometer calibration matrix

Register.Name: UM6_ACCEL_CAL_01
Register.Description: Row 0 column 1 element of accelerometer calibration matrix

Register.Name: UM6_ACCEL_CAL_02
Register.Description: Row 0 column 2 element of accelerometer calibration matrix

Register.Name: UM6_ACCEL_CAL_10
Register.Description: Row 1 column 0 element of accelerometer calibration matrix

Register.Name: UM6_ACCEL_CAL_11
Register.Description: Row 1 column 1 element of accelerometer calibration matrix

Register.Name: UM6_ACCEL_CAL_12
Register.Description: Row 1 column 2 element of accelerometer calibration matrix

Register.Name: UM6_ACCEL_CAL_20
Register.Description: Row 2 column 0 element of accelerometer calibration matrix

Register.Name: UM6_ACCEL_CAL_21
Register.Description: Row 2 column 1 element of accelerometer calibration matrix

Register.Name: UM6_ACCEL_CAL_22
Register.Description: Row 2 column 2 element of accelerometer calibration matrix

Register.Name: UM6_GYRO_CAL_00
Register.Description: Row 0 column 0 element of gyro calibration matrix

Register.Name: UM6_GYRO_CAL_01
Register.Description: Row 0 column 1 element of gyro calibration matrix

Register.Name: UM6_GYRO_CAL_02
Register.Description: Row 0 column 2 element of gyro calibration matrix

Register.Name: UM6_GYRO_CAL_10
Register.Description: Row 1 column 0 element of gyro calibration matrix

Register.Name: UM6_GYRO_CAL_11
Register.Description: Row 1 column 1 element of gyro calibration matrix

Register.Name: UM6_GYRO_CAL_12
Register.Description: Row 1 column 2 element of gyro calibration matrix

Register.Name: UM6_GYRO_CAL_20
Register.Description: Row 2 column 0 element of gyro calibration matrix

Register.Name: UM6_GYRO_CAL_21
Register.Description: Row 2 column 1 element of gyro calibration matrix

Register.Name: UM6_GYRO_CAL_22
Register.Description: Row 2 column 2 element of gyro calibration matrix

Register.Name: UM6_MAG_CAL_00
Register.Description: Row 0 column 0 element of magnetometer calibration matrix (for soft-iron distortion compensation)

Register.Name: UM6_MAG_CAL_01
Register.Description: Row 0 column 1 element of magnetometer calibration matrix (for soft-iron distortion compensation)

Register.Name: UM6_MAG_CAL_02
Register.Description: Row 0 column 2 element of magnetometer calibration matrix (for soft-iron distortion compensation)

Register.Name: UM6_MAG_CAL_10
Register.Description: Row 1 column 0 element of magnetometer calibration matrix (for soft-iron distortion compensation)

Register.Name: UM6_MAG_CAL_11
Register.Description: Row 1 column 1 element of magnetometer calibration matrix (for soft-iron distortion compensation)

Register.Name: UM6_MAG_CAL_12
Register.Description: Row 1 column 2 element of magnetometer calibration matrix (for soft-iron distortion compensation)

Register.Name: UM6_MAG_CAL_20
Register.Description: Row 2 column 0 element of magnetometer calibration matrix (for soft-iron distortion compensation)

Register.Name: UM6_MAG_CAL_21
Register.Description: Row 2 column 1 element of magnetometer calibration matrix (for soft-iron distortion compensation)

Register.Name: UM6_MAG_CAL_22
Register.Description: Row 2 column 2 element of magnetometer calibration matrix (for soft-iron distortion compensation)

Register.Name: UM6_ACC_GAIN
Register.Description: UM6_ACC_GAIN

Register.Name: UM6_ACC_LPF_GAIN
Register.Description: UM6_ACC_LPF_GAIN

Register.Name: UM6_ACC_LPF_TAU
Register.Description: UM6_ACC_LPF_TAU

Register.Name: UM6_STATUS
Register.Description: Status register

Register.Name: UM6_GYRO_RAW_XY
Register.Description: Raw output of x and y axis rate gyros. Stored as 16-bit signed integers.

Register.Name: UM6_GYRO_RAW_Z
Register.Description: Raw output of z-axis rate gyro. Stored as 16-bit signed integer.

Register.Name: UM6_ACCEL_RAW_XY
Register.Description: Raw output of x and y axis accelerometers. Stored as 16-bit signed integers.

Register.Name: UM6_ACCEL_RAW_Z
Register.Description: Raw output of z-axis accelerometer. Stored as 16-bit signed integer.

Register.Name: UM6_MAG_RAW_XY
Register.Description: Raw output of x and y axis magnetometers. Stored as 16-bit signed integers.

Register.Name: UM6_MAG_RAW_Z
Register.Description: Raw output of z-axis magnetometer. Stored as 16-bit signed integer.

Register.Name: UM6_GYRO_PROC_XY
Register.Description: X and Y-axis rate gyro output after alignment, bias, and scale compensation have been applied. Stored as two 16-bit signed integers.

Register.Name: UM6_GYRO_PROC_Z
Register.Description: Z-axis rate gyro output after alignment, bias, and scale compensation have been applied. Stored as 16-bit signed integer.

Register.Name: UM6_ACCEL_PROC_XY
Register.Description: X and Y-axis accelerometer output after alignment, bias, and scale compensation have been applied. Stored as two 16-bit signed integers.

Register.Name: UM6_ACCEL_PROC_Z
Register.Description: Z-axis accelerometer output after alignment, bias, and scale compensation have been applied. Stored as 16-bit signed integer.

Register.Name: UM6_MAG_PROC_XY
Register.Description: X and Y-axis magnetometer output after soft and hard iron calibration. Stored as 16-bit signed integers.

Register.Name: UM6_MAG_PROC_Z
Register.Description: Z-axis magnetometer output after soft and hard iron calibration. Stored as 16-bit signed integer.

Register.Name: UM6_EULER_PHI_THETA
Register.Description: Roll and pitch angles. Stored as 16-bit signed integers.

Register.Name: UM6_EULER_PSI
Register.Description: Yaw angle in degrees. Stored as 16-bit signed integer.

Register.Name: UM6_QUAT_AB
Register.Description: First two elements of attitude quaternion. Stored as two 16-bit signed integers.

Register.Name: UM6_QUAT_CD
Register.Description: Third and fourth elements of attitude quaternion. Stored as two 16-bit signed integers.

Register.Name: UM6_ERROR_COV_00
Register.Description: Row 0 column 0 element of error covariance matrix. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating point value.

Register.Name: UM6_ERROR_COV_01
Register.Description: Row 0 column 1 element of error covariance matrix. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating point value.

Register.Name: UM6_ERROR_COV_02
Register.Description: Row 0 column 2 element of error covariance matrix. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating point value.

Register.Name: UM6_ERROR_COV_03
Register.Description: Row 0 column 3 element of error covariance matrix. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating point value.

Register.Name: UM6_ERROR_COV_10
Register.Description: Row 1 column 0 element of error covariance matrix. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating point value.

Register.Name: UM6_ERROR_COV_11
Register.Description: Row 1 column 1 element of error covariance matrix. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating point value.

Register.Name: UM6_ERROR_COV_12
Register.Description: Row 1 column 2 element of error covariance matrix. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating point value.

Register.Name: UM6_ERROR_COV_13
Register.Description: Row 1 column 3 element of error covariance matrix. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating point value.

Register.Name: UM6_ERROR_COV_20
Register.Description: Row 2 column 0 element of error covariance matrix. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating point value.

Register.Name: UM6_ERROR_COV_21
Register.Description: Row 2 column 1 element of error covariance matrix. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating point value.

Register.Name: UM6_ERROR_COV_22
Register.Description: Row 2 column 2 element of error covariance matrix. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating point value.

Register.Name: UM6_ERROR_COV_23
Register.Description: Row 2 column 3 element of error covariance matrix. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating point value.

Register.Name: UM6_ERROR_COV_30
Register.Description: Row 3 column 0 element of error covariance matrix. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating point value.

Register.Name: UM6_ERROR_COV_31
Register.Description: Row 3column 1 element of error covariance matrix. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating point value.

Register.Name: UM6_ERROR_COV_32
Register.Description: Row 3 column 2 element of error covariance matrix. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating point value.

Register.Name: UM6_ERROR_COV_33
Register.Description: Row 3 column 3 element of error covariance matrix. Stored as 32-bit IEEE floating point value.

Register.Name: Theta acc
Register.Description: Theta acc

Register.Name: Theta acc hat
Register.Description: Theta acc hat

Register.Name: Theta LPF
Register.Description: Theta LPF

Register.Name: Theta direct
Register.Description: Theta direct

Command.Name: Get Firmware Revision
Command.Description: Causes the sensor to transmit to the current firmware revision

Command.Name: Write To Flash
Command.Description: Causes the sensor to write all current configuration settings to FLASH

Command.Name: Zero Rate Gyros
Command.Description: Causes the sensor to automatically zero the rate gyros

Command.Name: Reset EKF
Command.Description: Causes the sensor to reset the EKF and reinitialize state estimates

Command.Name: Get Data
Command.Description: Requests that data from all active channels be transmitted over the UART

Command.Name: Set Accelerometer Reference Vector
Command.Description: Causes the sensor to use the current acclereometer measurement as the measurement to expect when pitch and roll angles are zero

Command.Name: Set Magnetometer Reference Vector
Command.Description: Causes the sensor to use the current magnetometer measurement as the measurement to expect when pitch, roll, and yaw angles are zero

Command.Name: Reset to Factory
Command.Description: Causes the UM6 to reload factory-default settings

Command.Name: Write to Factory
Command.Description: Causes the UM6 to save current configuration as the factory-default
